author: Amai Ta. Yume
text: Thank you for the stream Rushia! I had a tough time supporting everyone, but I believe, you'll always be my number one. I shouldn't force my self. I am not alone. But at the same time I want to support you a lot! I want to thank the EN and JP bros again for having a wholesome community with you Rushia! Cheers for more contents with you! When I gain my own money, I'll continue to support you more than ever. Right now, I'll save up some more, but I'll always place you in my heart! Thank you so much! I love you Rushia! Fandeads love you too! Chu~
